Description
The Commercial Specialist focuses upon the provision of advice and administration to support in creating commercially attractive bid responses to our customers that lead to the award of contracts, and support managing the performance of the contracts to ensure Vodafone meets its obligations and commitments and delivers the expected financial value agreed pre-contract. The Commercial Specialist has a good understanding of concepts and procedures enabling them to support with high quality commercial and finance insights and deliver sustainable value through the planning, negotiation and management of customer contracts, which optimize the customer investment of acquisition and retention cost to ensure profitability. Typically reports to the Commercial Manager or the Senior Commercial Manager.

Job Responsibility* Demonstrates a good understanding of procedures and concepts through extensive experience and supports with the delivery of proactive commercial insight and planning;* Supports the team to deliver activities related, but not limited to ensuring optimised performance against service level agreements;* Performs assigned tasks related to building challenging but realistic forecasts and delivering on the company�s plans;* Supports to keep solid relationships with Financial Planning and Analysis (FPA) and Business Intelligence (BI) to ensure consistent, clear and accurate information;* Performs other job-related duties or tasks defined by the supervisor or resulting from assigned agendas.SkillsNot a perfect fit?Worried that you don’t meet all the desired criteria exactly?
